meanings.definition: A small, brimless cap worn by Jewish men as a sign of reverence and respect.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the rabbi placed a kippah on his head.
meanings.sent2: He always wears his kippah when he goes to the synagogue.
meanings.sent3: The kippah flew off in the wind, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His kippah, like a crown, symbolized his faith and tradition.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kippah stood out in the crowd, a symbol of his beliefs.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing a kippah as a religious practice.
meanings.sent1: The kippah is an important part of his religious attire.
meanings.sent2: He follows the tradition of kippah-wearing with dedication.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting his kippah at home, he felt incomplete during the service.
meanings.sent4: The kippah, a simple gesture, connected him to his faith.
meanings.sent5: In his daily routine, putting on the kippah was a sacred ritual.
